data.title: The Zone of Interest Blu-ray
data.meta_description: Blu-ray and 4K edition of Jonathan Glazer’s hypnotic and deeply chilling masterpiece starring Sandra Huller and Christian Friedel.
data.text:
Blu-ray and 4K edition of Jonathan Glazer’s Academy Award-winning masterpiece starring Sandra Huller and Christian Friedel.

Extras include postcards with stills photography by Agata Gryzbowska and Kuba Kaminski, a short documentary on Aleksandra Bystroń-Kołodziejczyk, a recording of “Sunbeams” (written and performed by Joseph Wulf), and 32-minute making-of documentary “Filming Zone,” directed, edited & photographed by Filip Skrońc.

“Filming Zone” can be watched with or without commentary by Production Designer Chris Oddy, Costume Designer Malgorzata Karpiuk, Director of Photography Łukasz Żal, and Editor Paul Watts.

Blu-ray and 4K edition of Jonathan Glazer’s Academy Award-winning masterpiece starring Sandra Huller and Christian Friedel.

Extras include postcards with stills photography by Agata Gryzbowska and Kuba Kaminski, a short documentary on Aleksandra Bystroń-Kołodziejczyk, a recording of “Sunbeams” (written and performed by Joseph Wulf), and 32-minute making-of documentary “Filming Zone,” directed, edited & photographed by Filip Skrońc.

“Filming Zone” can be watched with or without commentary by Production Designer Chris Oddy, Costume Designer Malgorzata Karpiuk, Director of Photography Łukasz Żal, and Editor Paul Watts.

Standard HD Blu-ray

○ 1080p High Definition

○ 16x9 Widescreen 1.78:1 Presentation

○ Dolby Atmos

○ German with English Subtitles

○ Rated PG-13

○ 106 minutes

○ English SDH, English Descriptive Audio, and Spanish subtitles available

4K UHD Blu-ray

○ 2160p UHD with HDR10

○ 16x9 Widescreen 1.78:1 Presentation

○ Dolby Atmos

○ German with English Subtitles

○ Rated PG-13

○ 106 minutes

○ English SDH, English Descriptive Audio, and Spanish subtitles available

‡ The 4K UHD Blu-ray is incompatible with standard Blu-ray players. To watch this disc you will need a 4K Blu-ray player. To watch the content as 4K UHD HDR you will need a 4K TV and a 4K Blu-ray player that supports HDR. Please check the specifications of your player before selecting this format.
